SiteNameAddress: Clive Barracks at Tern Hill, Shropshire
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: "The site is a strategic site that has been identified within the Local Plan Review. | The majority of the 50ha site is brownfield. It is anticipated that it has capacity for around 500 dwellings; significant amounts of employment land; and appropriate community and leisure facilities associated with a development of this scale.  | It is anticipated that much of the delivery on this site will occur beyond the next 15 years."
